label: RECEIVED BY:
description: Field for entering the name of the person who received the application.

label: REVIEWED BY:
description: Field for entering the name of the person who reviewed the application.

label: PAYMENT DATE:
description: Field to enter the date when the payment was made.

label: INVOICE #:
description: Field for entering the invoice number associated with the application.

label: SR #:
description: Field to enter the service request number if applicable.

label: COMMENTS:
description: Field for entering any additional comments or notes by the receiver or reviewer.

label: PUBLIC HEALTH PERMIT
description: Section heading for public health permit details.

label: PHP APPROVED BY:
description: Field for the name of the person who approved the public health permit.

label: PHP APPROVED DATE:
description: Field for entering the date when the public health permit was approved.

label: PHP INVOICE #:
description: Field to enter the public health permit invoice number.

label: INVOICE DATE:
description: Field for entering the date on the corresponding invoice.
